instruction: Develop a plan for launching a new product
input: The product is a meal delivery service that offers vegan meals with locally sourced ingredients
output: A plan for launching a new product could involve conducting market research and competitive analysis, creating a product roadmap, setting up a website and marketing channels, developing a pricing structure, creating a customer engagement strategy, producing high-quality product photography and video, setting up partnerships and distribution channels, creating a launch plan and timeline, conducting a beta test, and creating feedback loops and implementation plans.
